TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewHeaderCell extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell

summary.span: 包含行标头单元格和列标头单元格常用的功能。

span.span: Contains functionality common to row header cells and column header cells.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类是基其他标头单元格类，如和。This class is a base class for other header cell classes, such as and . 若要创建自定义行标头图标或列标头标志符号，请从继承类并添加功能来绘制自己图标或标志符号。To create custom row header icons or column header glyphs, inherit from the class and add functionality to paint your own icon or glyph.

para.span: 派生自并将新属性添加到派生的类，请确保重写方法以在克隆操作过程中复制新属性。

span.span: When you derive from and add new properties to the derived class, be sure to override the method to copy the new properties during cloning operations.

para.span: 你还应调用基类的方法，以便基类的属性复制到新的单元格。

span.span: You should also call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell.

summary.span: 获取标头单元格类似按钮的可视状态。

span.span: Gets the buttonlike visual state of the header cell.
One of the values; the default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A相当于一个按钮可它可通过单击设置状态，例如排序或执行行级别的选择。A is like a button in that it can be clicked to set states, such as sorting or performing row-level selection. 属性使用值，以提供类似按钮的可视状态。The property uses values to provide buttonlike visual states.

summary.span: 创建此单元格的精确副本。

span.span: Creates an exact copy of this cell.
An that represents the cloned .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写方法每当派生自并将新属性添加到派生的类。Override the method whenever you derive from and add new properties to the derived class.

para.span: 在重写派生类中调用基类的方法，以便基类的属性复制到新的单元格，并确保也将复制任何已添加到派生的类的属性的值。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell, and be sure to also copy the values of any properties that were added to the derived class.

value.span: 如果该单元格可见，则为 ；否则为 。

value.span: 如果单元格从 分离出来，则默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果单元格的行标题单元格，则它是可见的如果其行可见和属性是`true`。If the cell is a row header cell, then it is visible if its row is visible and the property is `true`. 如果该单元格的列标题单元格，则它的列是可见时，将显示与属性是`true`。If the cell is a column header cell, then it is visible if its column is visible and the property is `true`. 如果该单元格的左上方标头单元格，它是如果这两个可见和属实。If the cell is the top left header cell, it is visible if both and are true.
